name: Reserved listing for Jen
description:
The Celestial necklace is made with a 10 mm faceted Labradorite with an amazing blue flash.  Flanking the stone is a faceted sterling silver crescent moon and faceted star.  

The pendant measures 1 1/8" wide and 3/4" tall.   The chain is a 1.9mm cable chain that closes at 16" with a 2" extender and closes with a lobster claw clasp.

All metals are sterling silver that have been oxidized and brushed back. 

Thank you so much Jen!!

name: Personalized Owl Metal Ornament
description:
Every year it happens.  As I pull each one of the ornaments in my collection out of it's careful wrappings, I am reminded of years and memories past.   It is amazing how a year will pass by without seeing a particular ornament, and then I do see it again, and it is like seeing an old friend.  Maybe I'm sentimental.  In fact, I know I'm sentimental and it is one of the reasons I decided to begin making ornaments.  I began last year in the middle of December, and only managed to get a few made.  Too late to offer them to others to make their own memories with.  This year I started early.  I hope to offer a new ornament design (or two) every year.  

This design is an owl.  It measures 3" long and 2 1/2" wide.  You get your choice of metal, brass (in the first photo) or copper (second photo color sample only).  Also, your choice of color for the hanger (third photo).  

I make these ornaments one at a time by hand just for you.  It begins with sheet metal that I saw the design out of.  The metal is then filed and sanded to make all the edges smooth.  I then stamp by hand the design.  Each and every mark laid down in meticulous fashion one at a time.  After a ring is soldered on for hanging, I oxidize the metal and polish it.  I give it a final brushed finish before sealing the metal to help it maintain it's current color.

As you can see the two designs vary.  I can personalize each ornament just for you according to your wishes.  It could be your child's name, your family name, the names of your family, a special word or phrase.
It can be just nothing but decoration,  Baby's First Christmas, Our First Married Christmas.  Almost anything!  

At checkout you will let me know three things:  type of metal, color of hanger, and what you want it stamped with.  

My promise to you:  I will make you an ornament that is personal and beautiful.  I will make changes to the designs you see here to accommodate your personal message.  I will use the font best suited to your message.  Every ornament will have the year on it, and my signature stamp.  I am not a machine, and therefore sometimes my letters get away from me.  A slightly misaligned letter is not meant to be seen as a flaw, but as fact that this piece of art is made by hand.

Your ornament will arrive carefully wrapped in tissue and placed in a drawstring bag.  

Thank you for considering a handmade heirloom quality ornament!  If you have any questions at all please contact me!
amymarez@yahoo.com

description:
